description:
Looking like they just stepped off the pages of an early ‘90s National Geographic magazine, these sunnies bring a little glacial cool to your life. With removable side-shields, large lenses, and adjustable temples, the Cham provide excellent coverage.

  • Removable side-shields protect your eyes from all angles
  • Rubber grips on the temples and nose bridge reduce slippage
  • Long adjustable temples help to keep the glasses locked on your head
  • Flash lens coatings increase contrast
  • Category 4 lenses transmit only 5% of visible light. Great for glaciers, but too dark for driving or everyday wear
  • 6-base ARC lens curve minimizes distortion
name: Julbo Cham Sunglasses - Unisex
